Type.Name: ApplicationException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ApplicationException extends System.Exception

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

remarks.para: If you are designing an application that needs to create its own exceptions, you should derive custom exceptions from the class. It was originally thought that custom exceptions should derive from the class; however in practice this has not been found to add significant value. For more information, see Best Practices for Handling Exceptions.
uses the HRESULT COR_E_APPLICATION, which has the value 0x80131600.
